abstract.text: Replies to an exchange request on behalf of a recipient.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: The identifier for looking up the translated reply message in the default
file. If you use a formatted string with specifiers, provide the arguments.
A list of arguments to substitute into the localized string if it’s formatted and contains specifiers.
The game-specific data associated with the reply.
The block that GameKit calls when it completes the request.
The block receives the following parameter:
Describes an error if it occurs, or
if the operation completes.
error
To accept or decline an exchange request, invoke this method from the
protocol method. Include game-specific details about the exchange in the
parameter. When all recipients reply or time out, GameKit invokes the
protocol method in the game instances of the sender and the current participant.

abstract.text: Enable players to interact with friends, compare leaderboard ranks, earn achievements, and participate in multiplayer games.
Handles when all recipients of an exchange request respond.
Handles when the local player receives an exchange request from another participant.
Exchange request information that participants send in a turn-based match.
The date when all recipients of the exchange request reply.
The replies from recipients of the exchange request.
Replies to an exchange request on behalf of a recipient.
The status of the exchange request.
The status of an exchange or reply.
Add the ability for players to exchange game data and send messages while waiting for their turns.

doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/Ga.title: Exchanging data between players in turn-based games

abstract.text: A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.
The return type of functions that don’t explicitly specify a return type, that is, an empty tuple `()`.
A type representing an error value that can be thrown.
